attributes.action: exempt the Roman Catholic Church and all Faith adoption agencies from the requirements of the Government's proposed new Gay Rights laws
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It runs counter to every British principle of the rights of committed people of Faith to practice that faith, to force them to operate in a way which denies them their beliefs and conscience. It is not acceptable to those of Catholic persuasion - or indeed many others within the Christian
or other Faith communities to require them to place adopted youngsters with homosexual couples.  It is an intolerable intrusion by the State into personal commitment and religious belief.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "exempt the Roman Catholic Church and all Faith adoption agencies from the requirements of the Government's proposed new Gay Rights laws."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page12086.asp
